TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubMenuStyleCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示 控件中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理 控件中对象的集合 。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in a control. 控件使用 类作为属性的基础数据类型 。The control uses the class as the underlying data type of the property. 除了和属性之外，属性还提供其他样式 选项 。The property provides additional style choices in addition to the and properties. 集合中的第一种样式 对应于菜单第一级的子菜单样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二个样式对应于菜单第二级的子菜单样式，依此类推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the second level of the menu, and so on. 属性最常用于生成导航菜单（如网站图），其中某个级别的菜单项应具有相同外观，无论它们是否具有子菜单。The property is most often used to generate a navigation menu, like a Web site map, where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. 类从类继承其大部分成员 。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 有关继承成员的详细信息，请参阅 集合。For more information on the inherited members, see the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类 基于子菜单的级别指定控件中子菜单的样式设置。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to specify the style settings for the submenus in a control based on the submenu's level. 在此示例中， 属性返回 对象。In this example, the property returns a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuLevelSubMenuStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelSubMenuStyles/CS/menulevelsubmenustylescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuLevelSubMenuStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelSubMenuStyles/VB/menulevelsubmenustylesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器函数，用于创建与 指定索引对应的数据类型的。The method is a helper function that is used to create an of the data type that corresponds to the specified index. 通常通过使用 方法创建支持的数据类型的数组，然后在数组中搜索所需的数据类型来确定索引。The index is often determined by using the method to create an array of supported data types and then searching the array for the desired data type. `index`此方法的实现中未使用参数，将忽略该参数。The `index` parameter is not used in this implementation of the method and is ignored. 应始终 `null` 为此参数传递。You should always pass in `null` for this parameter. 此方法的实现始终返回空 对象。This implementation of the method always returns an empty object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法仅由控件开发人员使用。This method is used only by control developers.

Protected Overrides Function GetKnownTypes () As Type()

summary.span: 创建 对象的数组，其中包含 类所支持的数据类型。

span.span: Creates an array of objects that contains the supported data types of the class.

returns.span: 一个 对象数组，包含 类支持的数据类型。

span.span: An array of objects that contains the data types supported by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器函数，用于创建类支持的数据类型的数组 。The method is a helper function that is used to create an array of data types supported by the class. 通常会搜索数组以确定所需数据类型的索引。The array is often searched to determine the index of a desired data type. 然后，将索引传递给 方法以创建 相应的数据类型的。The index is then passed to the method to create an of the corresponding data type. > [!NOTE] > 此方法仅由控件开发人员使用。This method is used only by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 index 为-1， `style` 则将插入到集合的开头 。If index is -1, `style` is inserted at the beginning of the collection. 如果 index 等于集合中的项数， `style` 则将追加到集合的末尾 。If index equals the number of items in the collection, `style` is appended to the end of the collection. 在将 样式参数添加到集合之前，调用方法对其进行验证。The method is called to validate the style parameter before it is added to the collection. 在将 对象插入到集合中之前调用方法，并在 插入对象后调用方法。The method is called before the object is inserted into the collection, and the method is called after the object is inserted.

exception.span: 指定的 在集合范围之外。
